string.value: When I asked #p2060100# to give back the human's will power, she said she threw it away in the crack of a dimension. She said if I want it back, go to #b#m923000000##k and get it myself. She says #m923000000# can be opened by #b#t4000175##k as many times as I want....As long as I have #t4000175#, she said she would open the dimension. Arite, well, let's get #t4000175# first then. \r\n#i4031472##t4031472# #b#c4031472#/40#k
#p2060100# said that the separated will power can't be simply absorbed back.
Didn't you here that #p2060100# doesn't like humans? I'll kick you off if you are a lost traveler. What are you doing here? What do you want?\r\n#b#L0#I want my strong will back.#l

Will.. How did you get to know about it? Give you your will....I'll give it to you in honor of your coming here to see me. I don't wanna fight with you. \r\n#b#L0# Do you mean you're gonna give my Strong Will back??.#l
I can't just give it out. I imprisoned most of the Will inside the cracked dimension. You can open the dimension and bring the pieces of will. But it's hard. Do you want to do it?

Then I'll open the dimension. Get me a miniature Pianus. That's the key to open the dimension. Open the dimension, and get 40 Pieces of Courage. Ah, once you have a miniature Pianus, you can open the dimension with it, however every time you want to enter the dimension, you will need a miniature Pianus. Sadly, the miniature version only works once per trip for 5 minutes. But that's only for 5 minutes, which means you can go in there with as many friends as possible, but only for 5 minutes per trip.
I'm a witch. I shouldn't be nice to you. Now you can get out!
If you don't want it, fine. Your Will shall remain in the dimension.
You're pretty good to get 40 #t4031472#, but this is not the end. The will, when separated from the human host, can't be absorbed so soon.
Haven't you got #t04031472#? You're not as great as I thought. I heard you completed the 4th Job advancement...
